title: Does the MySQL database support SSL and multiple users?
content: Plesk does not currently support SSL encryption for MySQL. However, you can create and manage multiple database users directly in Plesk.

title: Can I use an external domain with my webspace via Cloudflare?
content: Yes. Add your webspace IP (DNS A record) in the domain settings and include the domain in Plesk. Guide: https://zap-hosting.com/guides/en/docs/webspace-adddomain

title: What happens if I exceed the 500 GB traffic limit?
content: If the limit is exceeded, the webspace will be blocked. Contact support to reactivate it.

title: Can I set up cron jobs with my webspace?
content: Yes, cron jobs are available with all webspace packages.

title: Can the database be reached via IP?
content: Yes, databases can generally be accessed via IP. If it doesn't work, support can help.

title: Is a Plesk license included?
content: Yes, the Plesk license is included with your webspace package.

title: Can I connect external domains using nameservers?
Can the database be used externally?
content: Yes, your webspace database can also be accessed externally.
